execution_plan.description: Find product_id(s) that have the maximum number of orders (i.e., most frequently ordered products) and return their order counts.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT MAX(cnt) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id) AS derived);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve ids, names and prices for the product(s) identified as most frequently ordered in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
